subject: Providing Foot Over Bridges (FoB) at accident prone  site on NHAI stretches -\r\n Reg.
text: IRav wzly  (TTHrf mfeasrut 7hI4 / Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (ea Wdrt ar TANf TT<T) WH/ Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) j-5 Wa 6, #aer-10 , ERAT, Tfarit-110075 6-5 & 6,Sector-10_ Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAIPolicy GuidelinesIProviding Foot Over Bridges (FoB) at accident prone site on NHAI stretches/2017 No.12.18/2017, Dated the November, 2017 (Decision_taken_ on File_NoNHAIRO-PAT/Policy/Circular /20172 Sub Providing Foot Over Bridges (FoB) at accident prone site on NHAI stretches In   partial modification of Policy Circular No_ 201/2016 dated 03.03.2016, wherein powers were delegated to Regional Officers to provide crossing facilities on National Highways i.e. FOBs at accident prone areas with approval under CoS upto Rs. 80 lakh & Rs. Cr. for 4 & 6 laning with date of completion of FOBs by 30.09.2016, but the FOBs have not been completed at number of places therefore the Competent Authority has accorded approval for extension of period of completion of FOBs upto 30.04.2018 in place of 30.09.2016. The other terms and conditions of the circular shall remain same_ (A.K. Sadhu) Chief General Manager (Coordination) To All Officers and Employees of HQ/ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices. Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi: GMQ NHA 15th Reg:
